data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 432,091 believers in Nuevo León that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nuevo León, Mexico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Nuevo León that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Nuevo León.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Nuevo León. Through your servants plant 824 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Huichol people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Huichol people.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 432,091 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, teach the church in the state of Nuevo León to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Nuevo León, Mexico from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.
